title: Dmitry Bystrov
text:
Dmitry Vyacheslavovich Bystrov (; born 30 July 1967; died 1 June 2005 of <a href="pneumonia">pneumonia</a>) was a <a href="Soviet%20Union">Soviet</a> and <a href="Russia">Russia</a>n professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a>er and coach.
European club competitions.
With <a href="PFC%20CSKA%20Moscow">PFC CSKA Moscow</a>.
